name: Don't Text and Cycle
description:
PLOT: 
Rush to your home to keep your roommate from wrecking your house! Dodge obstacles while texting your friend instructions so that they don't end up homeless.

COMMANDS:
Arrow keys: move
Space: use phone
Keypad Enter, forward slash, or backslash: send selected reply
Escape: pause

TEAM:
AziizDev - Programmer - Itch.io
DantonSlip - Artist - Twitter
Hoistbypetard - Programmer - Itch.io
Heiva Martin - Background Art - Artstation
Matthew Phoenix - Composer -  Instagram
Ruud - Composer - Website
